  • Constructor Details

    • UserService

      public UserService()
      Constructs a new UserService. Initializes the internal user map.

  • Method Details

    • loadUsers

      public Map<String,User> loadUsers()
      Loads user data from ApplicantList.csv, OfficerList.csv, and ManagerList.csv. Validates NRIC format and handles potential duplicates or role conflicts (e.g., user in multiple files). Populates the internal user map.
      Specified by:
      loadUsers in interface IUserService
      Returns:
      The map containing all loaded users, keyed by NRIC.

    • saveUsers

      public void saveUsers(Map<String,User> usersToSave)
      Saves the provided map of users back to their respective CSV files (ApplicantList, OfficerList, ManagerList). Overwrites the existing files. Updates the internal user map to match the saved state.
      Specified by:
      saveUsers in interface IUserService
      Parameters:
      usersToSave - The map of users (NRIC to User object) to save.

    • findUserByNric

      public User findUserByNric(String nric)
      Finds a user by their NRIC from the internally managed map.
      Specified by:
      findUserByNric in interface IUserService
      Parameters:
      nric - The NRIC of the user to find.
      Returns:
      The User object if found, or null otherwise.

    • getAllUsers

      public Map<String,User> getAllUsers()
      Retrieves a copy of the map containing all users currently managed by the service. Returning a copy prevents external modification of the internal state.
      Specified by:
      getAllUsers in interface IUserService
      Returns:
      A new HashMap containing all users (NRIC to User object).
